entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
